text: 04 / 10 / 18 : Kim Kardashian Apologises For Harmful Anorexia'Compliments'As a guest star of Ashley Graham's new podcast, Pretty Big Deal, Kim Kardashian West finally apologised for her and her sister's harmful comments about anorexia. Speaking to the backlash the mother - of - three said,'I honestly, looking back in having said that, I 100 percent completely understand where people would be coming from that felt that way.'Advertisement - Continue Reading Below She explained that, through personal experience, she understands the eating disorder is far from a compliment,'So my intention is never to offend anyone and I really, you know, apologise if I offended anyone, because an eating
